title: HTML Basic Examples
gp1: In this chapter we will show some basic HTML examples.
gp2: Don't worry if we use tags you have not learned about yet.
gp3: All HTML documents must start with a document type declaration: <!DOCTYPE html>.
gp4: The HTML document itself begins with <html> and ends with </html>.
gp5: The visible part of the HTML document is between <body> and </body>.
gp6: The <!DOCTYPE> declaration represents the document type, and helps browsers to display web pages correctly.
gp7: HTML headings are defined with the <h1> to <h6> tags.
gp8: <h1> defines the most important heading. <h6> defines the least important heading:
